MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW4 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Knutsford Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:43PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a suspected faulty transformer. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We now expect the power to be restored by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:36PM on 2nd February 2021.
